title: 'Push back': See photos of anti-Trump, Musk protests sweeping nation
shortDescription: Protestors across the country took to the streets Monday to repudiate the actions of Elon Musk and the Trump administration. See the photos.

title: Could Trump's birthday be a federal holiday? Bill proposes just that
shortDescription: Rep. Claudia Tenney introduced a bill that would make Trump’s birthday a federal holiday to recognize him as 'the founder of America's Golden Age.'

title: Rubio meets Saudi crown prince over Trump's Gaza plan
shortDescription: President Trump infuriated the Arab world by proposing the residents of Gaza be resettled in other Arab nations while the U.S. leads reconstruction.

title: President's Day protests rally against Trump administration actions
shortDescription: "Not My President's Day" protests are being held in cities across the nation on Presidents' Day against the Trump administration.

title: Fake quote on tax transparency attributed to Sen. Warren | Fact check
shortDescription: There is no evidence Warren said the quote in the post. It doesn’t appear on her website or social media accounts.

title: Trump administration fires, then un-fires, nuclear weapons workers
shortDescription: The Trump administration rescinded firings of hundreds of employees at the agency that oversees the nation's arsenal of nuclear weapons.

title: 'Critical moment in history': Protests across US target Trump, Musk
shortDescription: Discontent has intensified across the nation as the administration moves to lay off thousands of federal workers.

title: National Park Ranger frustrated by sudden layoff as part of Trump purge
shortDescription: In a now viral post, recently-fired National Parks Service ranger Brian Gibbs from Iowa, detailed his firing and what it means for his family.

title: 400 FAA employees fired by Trump administration weeks after collision
shortDescription: Hundreds of FAA employees were fired over the weekend as part of the Trump administration's mass firing of probationary employees.

title: Emboldened by Trump, Netanyahu says Israel will 'finish' job on Iran
shortDescription: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's threat was the latest indicator that Israel is considering a strike on Iran's nuclear facilities.

title: Argentina’s opposition threatens impeachment trial after Milei touts crypto
shortDescription: Milei could face an impeachment trial in Congress, opposition lawmakers said, after he touted a cryptocurrency which crashed soon after.

title: Gulf of America? Paper straws? Trump makes mark in ways big and small
shortDescription: Since his return to office, Donald Trump has worked to redefine 'reality' and put his stamp on American life. What's behind his unusual moves?

title: Argentine president could face impeachment trial over cryptocurrency
shortDescription: Javier Milei could face an impeachment trial, opposition lawmakers said, after the libertarian leader touted a cryptocurrency which crashed soon after.

title: Donald Trump: If it saves the country, it's not illegal
shortDescription: Echoing France's Napoleon Bonaparte, Donald Trump signaled continued resistance to limits on his executive authority in the face of legal challenges.

title: ‘Took away my hope.’ Federal workers say Trump firings upended their lives
shortDescription: Fired workers worried about making rent and paying student loans. Many talked about going into government work because they value public service.

title: Uncertainty of Trump 2.0 reminds some college presidents of pandemic
shortDescription: The first few weeks of the Trump presidency have left some college leaders reminded of the uncertainty they felt during the early days of COVID-19.
